member.name: T:ADONetHelper.DbObjectFactory
member.summary: A class that facilitates creating the ADO.NET class objects necessary to query a data store
member.remarks: is a class that is intended to be used at the lowest level of the ADO.NET workflow. It creates the objects necessary to query a relational database using the RDBMS providers own driver to do this.
